Race.SpecificTitle: PW (Except Franklinton) PC -- 1/3% S&U - PC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Proposition
(Except the Town of Franklinton)
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of Washington, State of Louisiana, under the provisions of Article VI, Section 30 of the Louisiana Constitution of 1974, as amended, and other constitutional and statutory authority, be authorized to levy and collect, a tax of one-third (1/3) of one percent (1%) (the "Tax") (an estimated $1,240,000 is reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the Tax for an entire year), within the Parish (excluding the area within the municipal boundaries of the Town of Franklinton), upon the sale at retail, the use, the lease or rental, the consumption, and the storage for use or consumption, of tangible personal property and on sales of services therein, for a period of ten (10) years, commencing January 1, 2014, with the net proceeds of the Tax to be dedicated solely to: providing, maintaining, administering and operating services and facilities in the civil, juvenile and criminal justice system mandated by state statute to be funded by parish governments?
